subject: Japan Earthquake and Tsunami (2011)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka led the Rakuten Eagles, who play in Sendai, a city ravaged by the 2011 earthquake and tsunami, to the Japan Series title last season.
snippet: Masahiro Tanaka led the Rakuten Eagles, who play in Sendai, a city ravaged by the 2011 earthquake and tsunami, to the Japan Series title last season.
